channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 07:23 Fragrant anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 07:23 Fragrant anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#of Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
